Class ec.transform.classparser.ConstantRefType 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.transform.classparser.Constant
           |
           +----ec.transform.classparser.ConstantRefType
public class ConstantRefType
extends Constant
An individual constant in the class file constant pool which describes a field, method, or interface method.

ConstantRefType(ClassFile, int, DataInputStream)
Build a ConstantRefType from a data stream
ConstantRefType(ClassFile, int, int, int)
Build a ConstantRefType from a tag, a class, and a name_and_type index.

getClassIndex()
Get the index in the constant pool of the constant class for this ref.
getClassName()
Get the name of the class which contains the thing this reference refers to.
getName()
Get the name of the method/field/interface this reference refers to.
getNameAndTypeIndex()
Get the index in the constant pool of the name and type for this ref.
getSignature()
Get the name of the method/field/interface this reference refers to.
renameName(String)
Rename the object this reference type references.

ConstantRefType 
 public ConstantRefType(ClassFile cf,
                        int tag,
                        DataInputStream s) throws ClassFormatError, IOException
Build a ConstantRefType from a data stream

Parameters:
s - the DataInputStream to parse
ConstantRefType 
 public ConstantRefType(ClassFile cf,
                        int tag,
                        int aClassIndex,
                        int aNameAndTypeIndex)
Build a ConstantRefType from a tag, a class, and a name_and_type index.

Parameters:
tag - one of CONSTANT_Fieldref, CONSTANT_Methodref, CONSTANT_InterfaceMethodref
aClassIndex - index of a CONSTANT_Class in the constant pool.
aNameAndTypeIndex - index of a CONSTANT_NameAndType in the constant pool

getClassName 
 public String getClassName() throws ClassFormatError
Get the name of the class which contains the thing this reference refers to.

Returns:
the fully qualified class name as a string with dot separators.
getName 
 public String getName() throws ClassFormatError
Get the name of the method/field/interface this reference refers to.

Returns:
the method/field/interface name as a string.
getSignature 
 public String getSignature() throws ClassFormatError
Get the name of the method/field/interface this reference refers to.

Returns:
the method/field/interface name as a string.
getClassIndex 
 public int getClassIndex()
Get the index in the constant pool of the constant class for this ref.

Returns:
the index.
getNameAndTypeIndex 
 public int getNameAndTypeIndex()
Get the index in the constant pool of the name and type for this ref.

Returns:
the index.
renameName 
 public void renameName(String newname)
Rename the object this reference type references.

Parameters:
newname - the new name to reference.
